name: Spherix
description:
Submission for ScoreSpace Jam #17

**PLEASE DO NOT GO FULL-SCREEN WITH THE BLUE BUTTON. IT WILL BREAK THE GAME**

Welcome to Spherix. This is a reflex-game where your speed will be tested! 

Number in the middle of the circle is the player level. There are difficulty increments at level 5, 10, and 20!

How fast are you?

Post your high scores on the comments!

Music, Art and Coding - Crossedkiller (me)

Assets used:

DOTween (for movement)

Ultimate Timer (not enough time to make my own timers)

---
Extra special shoutout to Mochii for keeping me company through most of my process and for giving some sick advise.
